amendment.description: Amendment provided for the consideration of two amendments to H.R. 841.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cole (OK) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) and on the bill without objection.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Cole (OK).
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Cole (OK) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cole (OK) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
